titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Henry W. Broude, Special Assistant to the President of Yale University, Records
Broude (Henry W), Special Assistant to the President of Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:40

did.unittitle: Henry W. Broude, special assistant to the president of Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of subject files documenting academics, administration, personnel, and research initiatives at Yale University.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 2-B (YRG 2-B), Records of Yale presidential assistants.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Henry W. Broude, Special Assistant to the President of Yale University, Records (RU 356). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of subject files documenting academics, administration, personnel, and research initiatives at Yale University.

did.unittitle: Records of Henry W. Broude as special assistant to the president of Yale University
Faculty of Arts and Sciences-Executive Committee
Institution for Social and Policy Studies
